member.name: WS_CHANNEL_DECODER
member.summary: A structure that is used to specify a set of callbacks that can transform the content type and encoded bytes of a received message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_DECODER.createContext
member.summary: A context that will be passed to the WS_CREATE_DECODER_CALLBACK.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_DECODER.createDecoderCallback
member.summary: A WS_CREATE_DECODER_CALLBACK callback that creates an instance of a decoder.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_DECODER.decoderGetContentTypeCallback
member.summary: A WS_DECODER_GET_CONTENT_TYPE_CALLBACK callback that is invoked to get the content type of the message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_DECODER.decoderStartCallback
member.summary: AWS_DECODER_START_CALLBACK callback that is invoked at the start of decoding a message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_DECODER.decoderDecodeCallback
member.summary: A WS_DECODER_DECODE_CALLBACK callback that is invoked to decode a message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_DECODER.decoderEndCallback
member.summary: A WS_DECODER_END_CALLBACK callback that is invoked at the end of decoding a message.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_DECODER.freeDecoderCallback
member.summary: A WS_FREE_DECODER_CALLBACK callback that frees an instance of a decoder.
